PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-09862016-11-18,  ,  ,  IRCC, 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Skilled Worker)
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (SKILLED WORKER) in order to (1) better align program requirements with program intent by ensuring job offer points are accessible to candidates who can demonstrate that they have an acceptable job offer, which contributes to the assessment of their likelihood of economic establishment; and (2) make other regulatory amendments to clarify policy intent or make the regulations more consistent.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0298 Publication Date: 2016-11-30
AttachmentsAttachment
